entries.title: Omicron BQ, XBB subvariants are a serious threat to boosters and knock out antibody treatments, study finds
entries.description: The latest omicron subvariants could cause a surge of breakthrough infections and reinfections, a new study finds.

entries.title: New FTX CEO is getting paid $1,300 an hour, and customers will foot the bill
entries.description: Overall, Ray and his three-person team are taking home $4,225 an hour.

entries.title: Trump hits 7-year low in new national poll as Biden approval climbs
entries.description: Trump has come under fire from some fellow Republicans after many of his handpicked candidates lost high-profile races in last month's midterm elections.

entries.title: Fusion power is still decades and billions of dollars away, even after this week's major scientific breakthrough
entries.description: Progress is happening fast, but the scope of the problem is immense.

entries.title: Why Europe's efforts to open up the iPhone won't hurt Apple too much
entries.description: When Apple CEO Tim Cook is asked about a thorny, controversial overseas issue, he usually says that Apple follows the law in every country where it operates.

entries.title: Fed raises interest rates half a point to highest level in 15 years
entries.description: The Federal Reserve raised its benchmark interest rate to the highest level in 15 years, indicating that the fight against inflation is not over yet.

entries.title: Treasury yields rise after Fed raises rates by half a point, indicates more hikes
entries.description: Treasury yields rose after the Federal Reserve delivered a 50 basis point rate hike and indicated that it will continue raising rates to tame inflation.

entries.title: 'Avatar: The Way of Water' could be heading for a $175 million box office opening
entries.description: The long-awaited sequel "Avatar: The Way of Water" is set to snare between $150 million and $175 million domestically during its opening weekend.

entries.title: DOJ and SEC charge social media influencers in alleged $100 million stock pump and dump scheme
entries.description: The defendants allegedly used Twitter and Discord to promote stocks without disclosing alleged plans to sell once the prices rose.

entries.title: Twitter suspends account dedicated to tracking Elon Musk's private jet
entries.description: The Twitter account used to track billionaire Elon Musk's private jet was suspended as of Wednesday morning.

entries.title: 'Harry & Meghan' becomes Netflix's biggest-ever documentary debut
entries.description: Netflix's documentary series about Britain's Prince Harry and his wife, Meghan, has become the streaming platform's biggest documentary debut yet.

entries.title: Photos show disgraced FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried cuffed in Bahamas on his way to jail
entries.description: Sam Bankman-Fried was photographed handcuffed Tuesday night after a judge denied him bail and remanded him to Bahamas' Fox Hill jail until February 2023.

entries.title: Here's everything the Federal Reserve is expected to do Wednesday
entries.description: Here's a quick look at the multiple variables that will come into play when this week's Fed meeting concludes Wednesday.

entries.title: Bank of England tipped for half-point rate hike as inflation shows signs of peaking
entries.description: The Bank of England faces the unenviable task of navigating a slowing economy, sky-high inflation and an extremely tight labor market.

entries.title: London suffers IPO 'drought' as fund raising plunges by 90% this year
entries.description: Analysts said the market had cooled due to weak economic growth forecasts, rising interest rates and wariness around the performance of British firms.

entries.title: Decade ahead will be great for investing but we'll need to wait 12 months first, CIO says
entries.description: Investors will need to wait out the next year to reap the financial rewards of the next decade according to Bill Smead from Smead Capital Management.

entries.title: Binance CEO says deposits are 'coming back in' but sees 'bumpy' road ahead for the crypto firm
entries.description: Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao on Wednesday said that the situation has "stabilized" at his cryptocurrency exchange in a bid to assuage investors' fears.

entries.title: UK inflation falls from 41-year high as fuel price surge eases
entries.description: U.K. inflation came in slightly below expectations at 10.7% in November, as cooling fuel prices helped ease price pressures.

entries.title: Morgan Stanley upgrades its 2023 growth outlook for China, expects stronger and earlier rebound
entries.description: Morgan Stanley raised its outlook for China's economy in 2023 on a rebound in activity that the firm predicts will come earlier and sharper than expected.

entries.title: European Central Bank set for 50 basis point rate hike on hopes that inflation has peaked
entries.description: The European Central Bank will continue to hike benchmark rates, albeit at a slower pace, with inflation expected to be close to a peak.

entries.title: Britain's new 'winter of discontent' deepens as widespread strikes mount over festive period
entries.description: The list of workers launching industrial action in the U.K. over the Christmas period continues to grow, fueling concerns about more persistent wage inflation.

entries.title: Jack Dorsey admits mistakes at Twitter, and says the site still has problems
entries.description: Twitter co-founder Jack Dorsey wrote in a blog post that he gave up pushing for the changes he wanted at Twitter after activist investors came into the company.

entries.title: Charts suggest it’s time to buy the dips in oil, Jim Cramer says
entries.description: "The charts, as interpreted by Carley Garner, suggest that the oil speculators have been mostly wiped out, so it's time to buy the dips," he said.
